amendment.description: To encourage increasing the amount of funds available for parent and family engagement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2178 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2178 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5096) To encourage increasing the amount of funds available for parent and family engagement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2178 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2089.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2178 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
